title: Kassadin is so weak right now...
body:
Isn't he? Or am I wrong?

EDIT: Holy mother of downvotes lmao Guess I'm wrong

replies.body: "kassadin IS THIS" "isnt he?" the laziest clickbait title evah
Kassadin is an Anti-mage type of champion and while isn't weak he is not the strongest at the moment.
I know that. I picked him the other day into LB, and his Q is too slow to block ANY burst from LB. The projectile reaches LB by the time I'm dead.

Hit a nearby minion then you will gain the shield quicker and you wont take as much damage.

Also LB's burst damage is quite high especially if her q hits you first.

I play lots of LB... I know :P 

I just played him into Veigar, did pretty well actually. I don't know, I just couldn't do anything against the Leblanc
kas is the same as a 60 min {{champion:78}} you cant win
